question.text: If the forest cover is reduced to half, the most likely outcome will be _____.

options.text: tribals living in these areas will starve to death.
cattle in these and the adjoining areas will die due to lack of fodder.
crop breeding programmes will suffer due to the reduced availability of a variety of germplasm.

solution.text: If the forest cover is reduced to half, large areas will become deserts. The development of the fertile top soil takes centuries. However, it can be removed very easily due to mainly deforestation, resulting in arid patches of land. When large barren patches extend and meet over time, a desert is created. Internationally, it has been recognised that desertification is a major problem nowadays, particularly due to increased urbanisation.
